note.p: Death: Caroline Place, Guildford Street, London (24 April 1815)
References: Seymour L Chapin, 'Lalande and the Longitude: A Little Known London Voyage of 1763' in NR 1977-8 vol 32 pp 165-180
Colonel H Quill, 'John Harrison, Copley Medallist, and the Â£20,000 Longitude Prize' in NR 1963 vol 18 pp 146-160
J C Taylor and A W Wolfendale, ' John Harrison: clockmaker and Copley Medallist. A public memorial at last' in NR 2007 vol 61 pp 53-62
